overview: "Verano Permanente" was filmed at the Vorterix Theater on August 11, 2018. The record of the show is a great summary of the uninterrupted path traveled through the entire discography and emblematic themes of Eterna Inocencia, a band formed in the mid-90s , in the heat of the boiling point of the hardcore punk scene of Buenos Aires.
title: Eterna Inocencia: Verano permanente (en vivo)
